articles.description: CORONAVIRUS is a deadly infection that's easily spread, and the disease has already killed more than 18,000 people in the UK. You could be at risk of COVID-19 infection if you have any of these three most common mild symptoms. Signs revealed by the World Heal…

Its becoming increasingly clear coronavirus is here, and its here to stay. 
Now doctors are warning that patients who have survived COVID-19 may be left with long-term health problems.

articles.title: Covid toes could be a symptom of coronavirus - FOX 4 Now
articles.description: If you can't think of any other reason that your toes are turning purple, you should call your doctor.
